LastPass 漏洞与价值 440 万美元的加密货币失窃有关https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/lastpass-breach-linked-to-theft-of-44-million-in-crypto/ Mon, 30 Oct 2023 18:46:52 -0400劳伦斯·艾布拉姆斯SecurityCryptoCurrency https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/lastpass-breach-linked-to-theft-of-44-million-in-crypto/ Hackers have stolen $4.4 million in cryptocurrency on October 25th using private keys and passphrases stored in stolen LastPass databases, according to research by crypto fraud researchers who have been researching similar incidents.
